enchantment.uniquebattle.lunatic_despair: Receive a Damage Boost, but also deal Damage to yourself
enchantment.uniquebattle.ares_fragment.d: Every Hit can either increase or decrease your Damage dealt. Chance increases with Player level
enchantment.unqiuebattle.golem_soul.desc: Gain Knockback Resistance, in exchange for Speed
enchantment.uniquebattle.ifrits_blessing: Hitting a burning Entity will deal additional Damage. Bonus is doubled if you're burning as well
enchantment.uniquebattle.ifrits_judgemen: Hitting the same Entity more than 4 times with the same Tool, will ignite you. Less hits grant you Rewards. Shift-rightclicking a Chest inserts the Items into the Chest
